summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Golasco Property PWA system. Backend APIs mostly functional (11/13 tests passed), frontend UI working well, but critical login integration issue found.

critical_bugs.issue: Login endpoint incorrectly uses UserCreate model requiring full_name and role fields, but should only need email and password

missing_features.impact: Cannot test lead creation and Razorpay booking flows
Payment integration will fail (expected for first implementation)

critical_bugs.issue: Frontend crashes with React runtime error when login API returns 422 error - 'Objects are not valid as a React child'
critical_bugs.impact: Login page becomes unusable after failed login attempt

integration_issues.issue: Frontend sends only email/password but backend expects full_name/role fields

passed_tests: Frontend registration flow and customer dashboard
Frontend-backend integration for registration and dashboard
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix login endpoint to use proper login model (email/password only) and fix frontend error handling for API responses. Add sample data for complete testing.
